thread.title: Energy Future Sues to Force Sale of Oncor Minority Stake
thread.title_full: Energy Future Sues to Force Sale of Oncor Minority Stake - WSJ

author: Peg Brickley
title: Energy Future Sues to Force Sale of Oncor Minority Stake
text:
Energy Future Holdings Corp. has sued to force the owner of 19.75% of its Oncor electricity-transmissions business to go along with a $12.2 billion deal designed to bail Energy Future out of bankruptcy.
Oncor, a cash-generating business that carries power to more than 3.2 million homes and businesses in Texas, is central to Energy Futureâ€™s chapter 11 exit proposal. It is set to be sold to an investment group led by Hunt Consolidated... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
